name: Fight & Crush
description:
How about a rematch?

Try new top experiences together with this new action game, called Fight & Crush! Being in the shoes of a beginner fighter, your main mission is to beat all the world fighters in your upcoming fights! You will have a limited time for this and limited health, so take care!

Arm with courage! The moment of the big chance has come, don’t miss it. Study and analyze the enemies carefully because each of them is preparing a surprise for you. Everyone is waiting to see a new invincible fighter. But what surprise are you preparing for the others?

Game Features :
- Training/Arcade Mode
- 20 characters
- Multiple fights
